Question & Options:
Who composed the score for the movie 'The Martian', released in 2015?
Options:
A. Hans Zimmer
B. Harry Gregson-Williams
C. John Williams
D. Danny Elfman

In the 2015 movie 'The Martian', which two songs are included in the exit music, with 'Don't Leave Me This Way' playing first?
Options:
A. I Will Always Love You
B. Don't Leave Me This Way
C. I Will Survive
D. Stayin' Alive
Correct Answer: Don't Leave Me This Way and I Will Survive
